solution_line_template: There are {total_cartons} - {loaded_cartons} = <<{total_cartons}-{loaded_cartons}={cartons_left}>>{cartons_left} cartons of canned juice that are left to be loaded on the truck.
This is equal to {cartons_left} x {cans_per_carton} = <<{cartons_left}*{cans_per_carton}={cans_left}>>{cans_left} cans of juice.
